scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bust of Christ, identifiable by his halo and beard. He has long, wavy brown hair, a beard, and is looking downwards with a somber expression. He is framed by a golden halo with radiating lines and an outer blue border decorated with white foliate motifs. The background is predominantly gold, suggesting a divine or celestial setting. Below his neck, a stylized blue cross is visible on his garment.
